channel.title: Self-Hosting on Alecks
channel.description: Recent content in Self-Hosting on Alecks

item.title: Mini PCs: the perfect home server
item.description:
Recently we’ve seen a surge in both governments and tech companies implementing Digital ID and AI Facial Recognition systems to prove users of social media platforms are above a minimum age requirement otherwise they will be restricted or fully blocked from using the platform.

This is not “for the kids”

All these laws and enforcements market themself as being purely for getting kids off social media
